title: Work For More - MiceKart Blogs
paragraphs: Monday morning blues can directly impact an employee’s efficiency and result in lower productivity and sometimes not allow an employee to enjoy the job he/she is doing.Feeling a sense of sadness, stress, anxiety on a Monday morning is a very common thing among most employees and more often these days when one is working from home & in total isolation.

To overcome these Monday morning blues and ensure that the team has a great weekend after a tiring & hectic week, we atmicekart.comhave designed a very unique Virtual Team engagement activity called “WFM: WORK FOR MORE”.WFM helps individuals overcome their Monday morning blues with some fun team engagement activities every Monday morning, to get them started & all charged up for the week ahead. We then reconnect the team once again at the end of the week with some amazing sundowner activities to celebrate, unwind and just have some fun.
“WORK FOR MORE” is a monthly program ideated in a way to provide your employees that corner of their work time where they de – stress themselves from their hectic“WFH: WORK FROM HOME”schedule.

Research shows that being ‘always on’ and accessible by technology while working from home leads to blurring work and non – work boundaries. This leads to high stress levels and lower productivity when compared to work at office.
Work for more engages your employees to energize the start of their week and makes sure that they relax their weekends.
This in turn results in high productivity of employees in a very economical employee engagement approach.
We engage your employee on a Monday morning with various enthusiastic programs and cool them off with destress programs to start of their weekend.
The activities are highly flexible and customizable as per organization’s requirements.
Choose any number of activities as per your liking.
Get in touch with us Today and talk to our experts:
